title: Boozy Chicken
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '30g butter', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '4 tablespoons gin', '1 tablespoon dry vermouth', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '50g pimento-stuffed green olives, sliced']
